o3smeasures.structures

Class Measure

  • java.lang.Object
    • o3smeasures.structures.Measure
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CouplingBetweenObjects, CyclomaticComplexity, DepthOfInheritanceTree, FanOut, LackCohesionMethods, LackCohesionMethodsFour, LackCohesionMethodsTwo, LinesOfCode, LooseClassCohesion, NumberOfAttributes, NumberOfChildren, NumberOfClasses, NumberOfMethods, ResponseForClass, TightClassCohesion, WeightMethodsPerClass

    public abstract class Measure
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that represents the measure entity. A measure has granularity and an AST parser to create the AST DOM for manipulating the source code.
    Since:
    13/07/2014
    Author:
    Mariana Azevedo
